PEOPLE ARE FOND OF DOINGCHAPTER IIIANNA PAVLOVNAS RECEPTION WAS IN FULL SWING THE SPINDLES HUMMEDSTEADILY AND CEASELESSLY ON ALL SIDES WITH THE EXCEPTION OF THE AUNTBESIDE WHOM SAT ONLY ONE ELDERLY
